name: 汪建民
objective:
Chapter I: Renewable Energy and Solar Potential
    (再生能源與太陽能之展望)
Chapter II: Crystal Chemistry and Crystallography
    (晶體化學和結晶學)
Chapter III: Electric Property-Semiconductor Physics and Solar Cell 
    (材料電性和太陽能電池)
Chapter IV: Electrochemical Property-Lithium Ion Rechargeable Battery 
    (材料電化學性質和鋰離子二次電池)
Chapter V: Optoelctronic Effects-Light-Emitting Diodes 
    (材料光電性和LED, 發光二極體)
Chapter VI: Magnetic Property-Nano-bits Media for Tera-world
    (材料磁性和磁記錄中的奈米世界)
schedule:
WK1~2 I: Renewable Energy & Solar Potential
WK3~5 II: Crystal Chemistry and Crystallography
WK6~9 III: Electric Property-Semiconductor Physics and Solar Cell 
WK10 Mid-Term Exam
WK11~13 IV: Electrochemical Property-Lithium Ion Rechargeable Battery 
WK14~15 V: Optoelctronic Effects-Light-Emitting Diodes 
WK16~17 VI: Magnetic Property-Nano-bits Media for Tera-world
WK18 Term Paper Presentation
scorePolicy:
Mid-Term Exam (期中考) 25%，
Term Paper (期末報告) 35%，
Home Work, Quiz and Class Performance (習題, 小考與上課表現) 40%。
